import Mathlib

open Set
open Topology
open MeasureTheory
open Complex

variable {U : Set ‚ÑÇ} (œà : ‚ÑÇ √ó ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ)

/-- Suppose U ‚äÜ ‚ÑÇ is open, and œà : U √ó [0,1] ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ is continuous and for each fixed t the map z ‚Ü¶ œà(z,t) is holomorphic on U.
    Then h(z) = ‚à´_0^1 œà(z,t) dt is holomorphic on U. -/
theorem integral_of_holomorphic_is_holomorphic (U_open : IsOpen U)
  (œà_cont : ContinuousOn (fun p : ‚ÑÇ √ó ‚Ñù => œà p) (U √óÀ¢ (Icc (0 : ‚Ñù) 1)))
  (holo_fiber : ‚àÄ t ‚àà Icc (0 : ‚Ñù) 1, DifferentiableOn ‚ÑÇ (fun z => œà (z, t)) U) :
  DifferentiableOn ‚ÑÇ (fun z => ‚à´ t in Icc (0 : ‚Ñù) 1, œà (z, t) ‚àÇvolume) U := by sorry
